for caseno in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    r = n % 7
    dr = 7 - r
    u = n % 10
    answer = max(7, n)
    if r == 0:
        print(answer)
        continue
    if u + dr < 10:
        answer = n + dr
    else:
        answer = n - r
    print(answer)

z = int(input())
for q in range(z):
    a = int(input())
    k = a % 7
    if k == 0:
        print(a)
        continue
    c = a % 10 + 7 - a % 7
    c1 = a - a % 7
    c3 = a + 7 - a % 7
    if 9 < c:
        print(c1)
    else:
        print(c3)

import sys
from math import *
from math import *
from functools import *
t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    a = b = 0
    for i in range(7):
        if (n + i) % 7 == 0:
            a = n + i
        if (n - i) % 7 == 0:
            b = n - i
    print(a) if a < n + (10 - n % 10) else print(b)
